# robocop

<!-- badges: start -->
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-R-blue)

## Installation

You can install the development version of robocop from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Majid-Eismann/robocop")
```

## Example

This is a basic example.

```{r example}
library(robocop)
```
